name: PowerCenter:Avoid undocumented external transformation
description: List all external transformation without any comments.
output:
This report lists all External Transformations without comment in the field Description.
It provides the following information:
External Transformation name
rationale:
An External/Custom/Stored Procedure Transformation is implemented completely outside Power Center environment. A Java Transformation is implemented within PowerCenter environment, but with Java code and no Informatica code. 
For understandability and maintainability external transformation should be  documentated.
remediation: Enrich external transformation and Java Transformation with comments in the field Description.
total: Total number of Mappings, Mapplets and Folders having external transformations
